post.body: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.body_html: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.title: According you, What is the worst part about being an Eldest Brother or an Eldest Sister?

body: In a middle or upper class household, you are the kid your parents will be most stringent with. Your younger siblings will get away with more, be allowed to stay out later, etc. It's not you, it's the fact that your parents loosened up once they got comfortable with how kids do.
body_html: In a middle or upper class household, you are the kid your parents will be most stringent with. Your younger siblings will get away with more, be allowed to stay out later, etc. It's not you, it's the fact that your parents loosened up once they got comfortable with how kids do.

post.body: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.body_html: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.title: According you, What is the worst part about being an Eldest Brother or an Eldest Sister?

body:
All the kids w older siblings have ins all over town and someone to guide them.  Oldest yourr all alone out there pioneering.

Also when you get older and realize all the ways you fucked them up with misguidance.  That one's a real gut punch.
body_html:
All the kids w older siblings have ins all over town and someone to guide them. Oldest yourr all alone out there pioneering.

Also when you get older and realize all the ways you fucked them up with misguidance. That one's a real gut punch.

author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: If you're a boy, you get blamed for everything, can do no good, while having all the responsibilities. I don't have any siblings myself but this is what I have seen in families that do.
body_html: If you're a boy, you get blamed for everything, can do no good, while having all the responsibilities. I don't have any siblings myself but this is what I have seen in families that do.

post.body: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.body_html: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.title: According you, What is the worst part about being an Eldest Brother or an Eldest Sister?

body:
In a current culture which views the divestment of personal accountability as a virtue, being elevated to "the only adult in the room" sucks.

I'm not the parent.  I genuinely don't care about your self inflicted problems and will sleep like a baby as you self destruct.
body_html:
In a current culture which views the divestment of personal accountability as a virtue, being elevated to "the only adult in the room" sucks.

I'm not the parent. I genuinely don't care about your self inflicted problems and will sleep like a baby as you self destruct.

post.body: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.body_html: What is the worst part about being a Firstborn?
post.title: According you, What is the worst part about being an Eldest Brother or an Eldest Sister?

author.bio: Unironic Anarcho-Monarchist. I also collect stamps.

body:
Me: "You have to be home by 10 o'clock! I will also call you and ask you where you are."

Younger brother: "Be home by midnight!"

Even younger sister: "As long as you show up during the weekend I guess it's OK."
body_html:
Me: "You have to be home by 10 o'clock! I will also call you and ask you where you are."

Younger brother: "Be home by midnight!"

Even younger sister: "As long as you show up during the weekend I guess it's OK."
